WorkItem.ClosedComment: Add an option when right-clicking on an update to create a superseding update.
WorkItem.Description: When right-clicking on an update, display an option to create a superseding update with the same Informations/rules and which automatically supersede the previous version.

Comments.Message: Definetly waiting for that feature to make things a bit easier.

WPP is now able to create a superseding update from an already published update.
* If the main update file is a MSI file :
 * If IsInstalled and/or IsInstallable rules contains :
     - Only one MsiProductInstalled Rule, then the old rule is adapted and copied to the new update. Non-MsiProductInstalled rules (i.e. Processor Architecture, File Version...) are copied 'As is'.
     - More than one MsiProductInstalled Rule, then old rules are copied 'As Is'.
     - No MsiProductInstalled rule, then old rules are copied 'As Is'.
     - No rule at all, WPP generate default MSI rule, based on the new MSI code.
* If the main update file is not a MSI file :
 * All rules are copied 'As Is'.
Great, Thanks a Lot for this Feature. :)
